languages.text: "Хорошие мины, уж поверьте моему опыту. Под хамелиолиновым напылением, в керамитовой оболочке и с когнивзрывателем, в котором сидит самый зловредный и хитрый дух машины, какого вам доводилось встречать. Слишком хорошая штучка для пиратов, а с учетом, что ими засеяли пустоту объемом в семь кубических километров, могу предположить, что это подарки из запасов Лорд-инквизитора".

"Good mines, I know from experience. Encased in ceramite under a coat of cameleoline, their cognidetonators are inhabited by the most malicious and cunning machine spirits you've ever seen. Far too good for pirates, and given that they've been planted for seven cubic kilometres, I reason that these are gifts from the Lord Inquisitor's own stores."
languages.original_text: "Хорошие мины, уж поверьте моему опыту. Под хамелиолиновым напылением, в керамитовой оболочке и с когнивзрывателем, в котором сидит самый зловредный и хитрый дух машины, какого вам доводилось встречать. Слишком хорошая штучка для пиратов, а с учетом, что ими засеяли пустоту объемом в семь кубических километров, могу предположить, что это подарки из запасов Лорд-инквизитора".

traits.locale_text: "Good mines, I know from experience. Encased in ceramite under a coat of cameleoline, their cognidetonators are inhabited by the most malicious and cunning machine spirits that you've ever seen. Too good for pirates and given that they've been sown in a volume of seven cubic kilometres, I reason that these are gifts from the Lord Inquisitor's stores."

"Good mines, I know from experience. Encased in ceramite under a coat of cameleoline, their cognidetonators are inhabited by the most malicious and cunning machine spirits that you've ever seen. Too good for pirates and given that they've been sown in a volume of seven cubic kilometres, I reason that these are gifts from the Lord Inquisitor's stores."

"Good mines, I know from experience. Encased in ceramite under a coat of cameleoline, their cognidetonators are inhabited by the most malicious and cunning machine spirits you've ever seen. Far too good for pirates, and given that they've been planted for seven cubic kilometres, I reason that these are gifts from the Lord Inquisitor's own stores."

"Good mines, I know from experience. Encased in ceramite under a coat of cameleoline, their cognidetonators are inhabited by the most malicious and cunning machine spirits you've ever seen. Far too good for pirates, and given that they've been planted for seven cubic kilometres, I reason that these are gifts from the Lord Inquisitor's own stores."

"Good mines, I know from experience. Encased in ceramite under a coat of cameleoline, their cognidetonators are inhabited by the most malicious and cunning machine spirits you've ever seen. Far too good for pirates, and given that they've been planted for seven cubic kilometres, I reason that these are gifts from the Lord Inquisitor's own stores."

languages.text: “经验告诉我，这些虚空雷都是好家伙。它们裹在陶钢里，外面涂着一层迷彩，沉思者里还住着你见过的最恶毒、最狡猾的机魂。这些虚空雷太厉害了，不可能是普通的海盗布下来的。考虑到这些玩意埋了整整七立方公里，我认为它们应该都出自大审判官的个人收藏。”
languages.original_text: "Good mines, I know from experience. Encased in ceramite under a coat of cameleoline, their cognidetonators are inhabited by the most malicious and cunning machine spirits you've ever seen. Far too good for pirates, and given that they've been planted for seven cubic kilometres, I reason that these are gifts from the Lord Inquisitor's own stores."

traits.locale_text: “经验告诉我，这些虚空雷都是好家伙。它们裹在陶钢里，外面涂着一层迷彩，思考器里还住着你见过的最恶毒、最狡猾的机魂。这些虚空雷太厉害了，不可能是普通的海盗布下来的。考虑到这些玩意埋了整整七立方公里，我认为它们应该都出自审判长的个人收藏。”

languages.text: 「良い地雷は敬虔から分かる。カメレオラインで覆われたセラマイトのコグニデトネーターには、見たこともないような悪意に満ちた狡猾な機械精霊が宿っている。 海賊にはもったいなさすぎる。7立方キロにわたって植えられていることを考えると、ロード・インクィジターからの贈り物だろう」
languages.original_text: "Good mines, I know from experience. Encased in ceramite under a coat of cameleoline, their cognidetonators are inhabited by the most malicious and cunning machine spirits you've ever seen. Far too good for pirates, and given that they've been planted for seven cubic kilometres, I reason that these are gifts from the Lord Inquisitor's own stores."

traits.locale_text: 「良い地雷は敬虔から分かる。カメレオラインで覆われたセラマイトのコグニデトネーターには、見たこともないような悪意に満ちた狡猾な機械精霊が宿っている。 海賊にはもったいなさすぎる。7立方キロにわたって植えられていることを考えると、ロード・インクィジターからの贈り物だろう」

languages.text: «Buenas minas, lo sé por experiencia. Cubiertas de ceramita bajo una capa de lino camaleónico, sus cognidetonadores están habitados por los espíritus máquina más malignos y astutos que jamás haya visto. Son demasiado buenas para ser obra de piratas, y, dado que se han colocado a lo largo de siete kilómetros cúbicos, razono que son parte de las reservas del Lord Inquisidor».
languages.original_text: "Good mines, I know from experience. Encased in ceramite under a coat of cameleoline, their cognidetonators are inhabited by the most malicious and cunning machine spirits you've ever seen. Far too good for pirates, and given that they've been planted for seven cubic kilometres, I reason that these are gifts from the Lord Inquisitor's own stores."

traits.locale_text: «Buenas minas, lo sé por experiencia. Cubiertas de ceramita bajo una capa de lino camaleónico, sus cognidetonadores están habitados por los espíritus máquina más malignos y astutos que jamás haya visto. Son demasiado buenas para ser obra de piratas, y, dado que se han colocado a lo largo de siete kilómetros cúbicos, razono que son parte de las reservas del Lord Inquisidor».

languages.text: "Gute Bomben, das weiß ich aus Erfahrung. Ein Ceramitmantel, darüber noch eine Schicht Chameolin. Die Cognidetonatoren werden von heimtückischsten und gerissensten Maschinengeistern bewohnt, die Ihr je erlebt habt. Viel zu gut für Piraten, und wenn man bedenkt, dass sie in sieben Kubikkilometern ausgebracht sind, würde ich davon ausgehen, dass das Geschenke aus dem persönlichen Vorrat des Großinquisitors sind."
languages.original_text: "Good mines, I know from experience. Encased in ceramite under a coat of cameleoline, their cognidetonators are inhabited by the most malicious and cunning machine spirits you've ever seen. Far too good for pirates, and given that they've been planted for seven cubic kilometres, I reason that these are gifts from the Lord Inquisitor's own stores."

traits.locale_text: "Gute Bomben, das weiß ich aus Erfahrung. Ein Ceramitmantel, darüber noch eine Schicht Chameolin. Die Cognidetonatoren werden von heimtückischsten und gerissensten Maschinengeistern bewohnt, die Ihr je erlebt habt. Viel zu gut für Piraten, und wenn man bedenkt, dass sie in sieben Kubikkilometern ausgebracht sind, würde ich davon ausgehen, dass das Geschenke aus dem persönlichen Vorrat des Großinquisitors sind."

languages.text: « Du matériel de premier ordre, croyez-en mon expérience. Boîtiers en céramite enduits de caméléolin et cognidétonateurs habités par les esprits de la machine les plus vicieux et rusés que vous ayez jamais vus. Ces mines sont trop sophistiquées pour des pirates, et vu qu'elles couvrent quelque sept kilomètres cubes, je dirais qu'elles sortent tout droit des réserves personnelles du seigneur inquisiteur. »
languages.original_text: "Good mines, I know from experience. Encased in ceramite under a coat of cameleoline, their cognidetonators are inhabited by the most malicious and cunning machine spirits you've ever seen. Far too good for pirates, and given that they've been planted for seven cubic kilometres, I reason that these are gifts from the Lord Inquisitor's own stores."

traits.locale_text: « Du matériel de premier ordre, croyez-en mon expérience. Boîtiers en céramite enduits de caméléolin et cognidétonateurs habités par les esprits de la machine les plus vicieux et rusés que vous ayez jamais vus. Ces mines sont trop sophistiquées pour des pirates, et vu qu'elles couvrent quelque sept kilomètres cubes, je dirais qu'elles sortent tout droit des réserves personnelles du seigneur inquisiteur. »

languages.text: "İyi mayınlardır, kendi tecrübemden biliyorum. Bir kat bukalemolinin üzeri seramitle kaplanmış. Kavrafünyelerin içinde de görüp görülebilecek en kötücül ve kurnaz makine ruhları bulunur. Korsan işi olamayacak kadar iyi olduklarına ve yedi kilometreküplük bir alana yayıldıklarına göre bana soracak olursanız bunlar Lord Engizisyoncu'nun eseri."
languages.original_text: "Good mines, I know from experience. Encased in ceramite under a coat of cameleoline, their cognidetonators are inhabited by the most malicious and cunning machine spirits you've ever seen. Far too good for pirates, and given that they've been planted for seven cubic kilometres, I reason that these are gifts from the Lord Inquisitor's own stores."
